forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display&section=screenshot&id=535)
**File Name** : Grub Installer Pack  
**File Submitter** : [Ralphsoft](http://reboot.pro/user/65400-ralphsoft/ "")  
**File Submitted** : 06 Oct 2014  
**File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/files/category/7-boot-tools/ "")  

**GRUB Installer Package by Ralphsoft**   

**NOTE:** INSTALLING GRUB WILL WIPE YOUR CURRENT MBR/PBR!!!  

This install package has pre-made grub files for you, you can use bootice to edit the grub4dos boot menu.  

By Ralphsoft.  

[Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/files/file/535-grub-installer-pack/ "")
